audioText: Cette entreprise innovante est capable de transformer radicalement l'industrie technologique grâce à ses algorithmes d'intelligence artificielle révolutionnaires et sa vision stratégique à long terme.
question: What makes this innovative company remarkable?
options: Its ability to radically transform the tech industry through revolutionary AI algorithms and long-term strategic vision
Its capacity to reduce production costs while maintaining high quality standards
Its skill in recruiting the most talented engineers from prestigious universities
Its potential to expand internationally through strategic partnerships and acquisitions
explanation: The text states the company 'est capable de transformer radicalement l'industrie technologique grâce à ses algorithmes d'intelligence artificielle révolutionnaires et sa vision stratégique à long terme' - is capable of radically transforming the tech industry thanks to its revolutionary AI algorithms and long-term strategic vision. 'Capable' means able/capable of doing something.
